ygData.msgSnippet: (G1 and G2 Transformers didn t need to breath.  I know that, because they were in space before and made no comments about it. Though, in the TF:TM

(G1 and G2 Transformers didn't need to breath.  I know that, because they 
were in space before and made no comments about it.  

    Though, in the TF:TM (Transformers: The Movie), Galvatron tried killing 
Hot Rod via choking...but I think that was just kind of a mistake.

    Beast Wars though, is, well, different.  They make sounds like they do.  
But I don't know.  Maybe the Beast Warriors needed to breath oxygen to 
oxygenize their mech-fluid?  Can't say for sure.  Hope that just didn't make 
more questions)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg
Making a better tomorrow, for himself
